schemes.name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
schemes.description: Direct income support to all landholding farmers' families. Rs.6,000 per year in three equal installments of Rs.2,000 each.

schemes.name: PMFBY (Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana)
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support in case of crop failure due to natural calamities, pests & diseases.
schemes.benefits: Up to 90% premium subsidy on insurance

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.description: Free soil testing and nutrient-based recommendations to improve soil health and productivity.
schemes.benefits: Free soil testing + personalized fertilizer recommendations

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.description: Easy access to credit for farmers at subsidized interest rates for agricultural and allied activities.
schemes.benefits: Interest subvention up to 2%, credit limit up to Rs.3 lakh

schemes.name: PKVY (Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana)
schemes.description: Promotion of organic farming through cluster approach and PGS certification.
eligibility: Must form groups of 50 or more
schemes.benefits: Rs.50,000 per hectare for 3 years + certification support

schemes.name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
schemes.description: Pan-India electronic trading portal for agricultural commodities ensuring transparent price discovery.
schemes.benefits: Direct market access + transparent pricing + online payment

schemes.name: PM Kusum (Solar Pump Subsidy)
schemes.description: Financial support for installation of solar pumps and solarization of grid-connected agriculture pumps.
schemes.benefits: Up to 60% subsidy on solar pump installation
schemes.organization: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy

schemes.name: Micro Irrigation Fund
schemes.description: Support for installing drip and sprinkler irrigation systems under PMKSY.
